DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate prevalence small intestinal bacterial overgrowth ( SIBO ) patient undergo enteroscopy outpatient procedure symptom functional dyspepsia . In addition , investigator would like identify type bacteria present small intestine patient SIBO compare two different diagnostic tool : microbiologic culture DNA sequencing bacteria . The aim compare microbiota patient without clinical complication SIBO
DOC.brief_title: Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth : A Prospective Registry
DOC.criteria: 1.Study Subjects Inclusion Criteria . All patient undergo small bowel aspiration suspect SIBO regardless etiology . Exclusion Criteria . Use colon cleanse prep past 1 month ii . Treatment antibiotic past 30 day ( antibiotic allowable patient undergo clinical indicated repeat aspiration determine bacteria clearance ) iii . Use probiotic past 30 day iv . Contraindication upper endoscopy reason v. Prisoners vi . Pregnant vii . Unable give inform consent 2 Control Subjects Inclusion Criteria . Patients undergo double balloon enteroscopy upper enteroscopy another medical reason . Exclusion Criteria . Diagnosis SIBO ii . Diagnosis functional dyspepsia iii . Established risk factor SIBO ( ANY follow ) 1 . Connective tissue disorder ( scleroderma , polymyositis , mixed connective tissue disease , systemic lupus 2 . Resection ileocecal valve reason 3 . Chronic intestinal pseudoobstruction 4 . Small bowel blind limb , diverticulum fistula 5 . Surgery decrease gastric acid exposure small bowel a. Gastric surgery vagotomy ( Bilroth I , Bilroth II , vagotomy/pyloroplasty ) gastric bypass iv . Use colon cleanse prep past 1 month v. Use antibiotic past 30 day vi . Use probiotic past 30 day vii . Contraindication upper endoscopy reason viii . Prisoners ix . Pregnant x . Unable give informed
